reference.title: apiClassifier
reference.shortdesc: The <apiClassifier> element specifies a classifier and comes in several specific forms, including class, data type, interface, component, and other API references.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <apiClassifier> element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> or <xref> elements (conref and keyref attributes), and for other internal specialization elements that refer to this <apiClassifier> content. Use a unique key such as fully qualified package name for the named API reference.
